verbose_text: To investigate the impact of IL-4Ralpha signaling on keratinocytes in a protective Th1 cell differentiation against cutaneous leishmaniasis, we generated mice on the C57BL/6 genetic background that are genetically deficient in IL-4Ralpha expression on keratinocytes (KRT14 Cre IL-4Ralpha -/lox) using the Cre / LoxP recombination system under control of the KRT14 locus.
